industry: Non-profit Organizations and Primary and Secondary Education
description:
Mandate:

Reporting to the Operations Manager, the Freight Import Associate will be responsible for monitoring international cargo from origin to its final destination as well as handling all customer needs regarding import and export documentation. You will be responsible for interacting daily with customers, service providers and carriers as well as issue invoices according to policy. You will also be responsible for tracking outgoing couriers and any other duties that are assigned.

Requirements:

  • 2-3 years of experience in Freight Forwarding operations (air, ocean and ground)
  • Experience in dealing with local brokerage procedures and US customs regulations
  • Cargowise experience is considered an asset


What You Offer:

  • Self-motivation, positive attitude, and eagerness to learn and accept new challenges
  • Proficiency in Windows based programs (MS Office)
  • Excellent English communication skills (spoken and written)
  • Exceptional customer service & problem solving skills


What We Offer:

  • Equal opportunity employer
  • Competitive compensation
  • Comprehensive health and dental care
  • Balance between work and home life
  • Salary range of : 50,000-60,000 USD
